channel.title: Annihilated Reality || Nex ||The Perfect Eco Server
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/snjl3p.png[/img]
Hello, Annihilated Reality is a economy based server we are undergoing a lot of updates to ensure you the best of game play, we are aiming for new content releases so that players do now grow bored of doing the same thing. we hope to have a growing PKing community as well as our economy. i hope to see some new faces and hope you enjoy!
[COLOR=#EE82EE][B]Now has active community about 15+ always on![/B][/COLOR]
Updates Log [code] * Fixed Special attacks * * Fixed Switching lag * * Fixed Gem Crafting * * Fixed Teleports * * Added Auto-Donation page * * Fixed Vote4Reward * * Fixed Donator Teleports * * Added custom XP boost ranks * * Updated outdated client information * * Fixed Prayer Drains * * Added Special effects to Spirit Shields * * Added Completionist cape when all 99's * * Fixed Hunter, and Summoning * * Added Nex * * Fixed Ranged Weapons * * Fixed Some Item Slots * * Updated Client * * Made nex fight more intense for teaming * * Added in ring of wealth * * Fixed multiple skills * * Added Elite Slayer Tasks * * Fixed NPC Clipping * * Fixed Combat Clipping * * 100% curse prayers! * [/code]
[URL=http://"http://annihilatedreality.net/webclient.php"][B]PLAY NOW![/B][/URL] [URL=http://"http://annihilatedreality.net/forums/"][B]Community Forum[/B][/URL]
[U][B]Server Features[/B][/U]
[ul][*] Perfect Switching [*] Pking all around the server [*] More that 25 unique bosses [*] Advanced Pk point system [*] Automatic Double Xp weekends [*] Tons of different training areas [*] Duel arena - Staking [*] Fun Pk [*] Active Staff [*] Vote system fully functional [*] Summoning with all familiars [*] More than 1600 npc's spawned! [*] Ability to reset combat skills [*] Full pest control [*] Custom interfaces [*] Oldschool above-Ground barrows [*] fully working Nex [*] Almost all skills work! [*] Dupes are fixed ! [*] Clipped Following [*] Slayer Point System [*] Vote Point System [*] Level Point System [*] Real dicing through clan-chat [*] Zombie Mini-game [*] Ring of Wealth [*]Many more features ![/ul]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r9nfL9JWUxM
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2gsoqcm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/htgvau.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2elgfsw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2ajq73c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2zgbzma.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2zinekx.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3447255/boss1.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3447256/boss2.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3447257/boss3.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3447259/boss4.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3447261/barrows.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/28w2i4i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/wgoojq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/33z7868.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/28jwoqq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/55ovt0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/34jbo9d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2wlsll4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2luorxg.png[/img]
[COLOR=#FF0000]Client features[/COLOR] - Ability to choose between x10 and x1 hitmarks - Ability to choose between new hitmarks (with combat style icon) or old hitmarks - Ability to choose between game frames
[COLOR=#FFD700]Feel free to criticize my server, wont mind it and i hope to see some new faces on it so thanks for taking the time to view this :)[/COLOR]
[URL=http://"http://annihilatedreality.net/webclient.php"][B]PLAY NOW![/B][/URL] [URL=http://"http://annihilatedreality.net/forums/"][B]Community Forum[/B][/URL][/CENTER]

item.title: Annihilated Reality || Nex ||The Perfect Eco Server
item.dc:creator: @chiapet chiapet
item.description:
@chiapet wrote:

[CENTER]

snjl3p.png793×90

Hello, Annihilated Reality is a economy based server we are undergoing a lot of updates to ensure you the best of game play, we are aiming for new content releases so that players do now grow bored of doing the same thing. we hope to have a growing PKing community as well as our economy. i hope to see some new faces and hope you enjoy!

[COLOR=#EE82EE]Now has active community about 15+ always on![/COLOR]

Updates Log

* Fixed Special attacks *
* Fixed Switching lag *
* Fixed Gem Crafting *
* Fixed Teleports *
* Added Auto-Donation page *
* Fixed Vote4Reward *
* Fixed Donator Teleports *
* Added custom XP boost ranks *
* Updated outdated client information *
* Fixed Prayer Drains *
* Added Special effects to Spirit Shields *
* Added Completionist cape when all 99's * 
* Fixed Hunter, and Summoning * 
* Added Nex *
* Fixed Ranged Weapons *
* Fixed Some Item Slots *
* Updated Client *
* Made nex fight more intense for teaming *
* Added in ring of wealth *
* Fixed multiple skills *
* Added Elite Slayer Tasks *
* Fixed NPC Clipping *
* Fixed Combat Clipping *
* 100% curse prayers! *

PLAY NOW!
Community Forum

Server Features

[ul][] Perfect Switching
[] Pking all around the server
[] More that 25 unique bosses
[] Advanced Pk point system
[] Automatic Double Xp weekends
[] Tons of different training areas
[] Duel arena - Staking
[] Fun Pk
[] Active Staff
[] Vote system fully functional
[] Summoning with all familiars
[] More than 1600 npc’s spawned!
[] Ability to reset combat skills
[] Full pest control
[] Custom interfaces
[] Oldschool above-Ground barrows
[] fully working Nex
[] Almost all skills work!
[] Dupes are fixed !
[] Clipped Following
[] Slayer Point System
[] Vote Point System
[] Level Point System
[] Real dicing through clan-chat
[] Zombie Mini-game
[] Ring of Wealth
[*]Many more features ![/ul]



















[COLOR=#FF0000]Client features[/COLOR]

  • Ability to choose between x10 and x1 hitmarks
  • Ability to choose between new hitmarks (with combat style icon) or old hitmarks
  • Ability to choose between game frames

[COLOR=#FFD700]Feel free to criticize my server, wont mind it and i hope to see some new faces on it so thanks for taking the time to view this :)[/COLOR]

PLAY NOW!
Community Forum[/CENTER]
